Usage GuideÂ¶

This guide covers all the features and functionality of GrowKitty, helping you make the most of your habit-building journey.

Dashboard OverviewÂ¶

The main dashboard is your command center for habit tracking:

Layout Components

  1. Virtual Cat Display (Center)

    • Shows your catâ€™s current state and mood

    • Reacts to your habit completion rate

    • Displays growth stages and accessories

  2. Habit List (Left Panel)

    • All your active habits

    • Quick check-off buttons

    • Streak indicators

    • Success rate percentage

  3. Mission Board (Right Panel)

    • Todayâ€™s random missions

    • Reward information

    • Completion status

    • Timer until new missions

  4. Statistics Bar (Top)

    • Overall success rate

    • Current streak

    • Total habits completed

    • Level and experience points

Managing HabitsÂ¶

Creating HabitsÂ¶

To add a new habit:

  1. Click â€œ+ Add Habitâ€ button

  2. Fill in the habit details:

    Name: Morning Exercise
Category: Health & Fitness
Frequency: Daily
Time: 07:00 AM
Reminder: Enabled
Notes: 30 minutes of cardio

  3. Click â€œSave Habitâ€

Best Practices

  • Start with 3-5 habits to avoid overwhelm

  • Be specific (e.g., â€œRun 3kmâ€ vs â€œExerciseâ€)

  • Choose realistic frequencies

  • Set reminders for new habits

Editing HabitsÂ¶

To modify an existing habit:

  1. Click the habit card

  2. Select â€œEditâ€ icon (âœï¸)

  3. Update fields as needed

  4. Click â€œSave Changesâ€

You can change:

  • Habit name and description

  • Category and tags

  • Frequency and timing

  • Reminder settings

Completing HabitsÂ¶

To mark a habit as complete:

Quick Complete

  • Click the checkbox next to the habit name

  • The habit card will animate with confirmation

  • Your cat will react positively

Detailed Logging

  1. Click the habit card

  2. Add notes about todayâ€™s completion (optional)

  3. Rate your performance (1-5 stars)

  4. Click â€œMark Completeâ€

Skipping HabitsÂ¶

If you need to skip a habit:

  1. Click the habit card

  2. Select â€œSkip Todayâ€

  3. Optionally add a reason

  4. Click â€œConfirm Skipâ€

Note

Skipping too many days in a row will affect your catâ€™s mood and growth rate.

Creating Custom Categories

  1. Go to Settings â†’ Categories

  2. Click â€œ+ Add Categoryâ€

  3. Enter name and select an emoji

  4. Choose a color theme

  5. Click â€œCreateâ€

Mission SystemÂ¶

Understanding MissionsÂ¶

Missions are daily challenges that:

  • Add variety to your routine

  • Prevent monotony and boredom

  • Provide bonus rewards

  • Unlock special cat accessories

Mission TypesÂ¶

Daily Missions (3 per day)

  1. Habit Combination: Complete 3 specific habits today

  2. Perfect Day: Complete all habits without skipping

  3. Early Bird: Complete 2 habits before 10 AM

  4. Consistency: Maintain your streak for 7 days

  5. Explorer: Try a new habit category

Weekly Challenges

  • Complete 50 total habits this week

  • Achieve 90%+ success rate

  • Share progress with 3 friends

  • Unlock 5 new cat accessories

Special Events

  • Seasonal missions (holidays, seasons)

  • Community events

  • Limited-time challenges

Completing MissionsÂ¶

Missions auto-complete when requirements are met:

  1. Check mission progress on the Mission Board

  2. Complete the required habits/actions

  3. Receive instant notification and rewards

  4. See your catâ€™s special reaction

Mission RewardsÂ¶

Rewards are automatically added:

  • Experience Points: 50-200 XP per mission

  • Coins: 10-50 coins for shop purchases

  • Accessories: Exclusive cat items

  • Badges: Achievement unlocks

Virtual Cat SystemÂ¶

Cat Growth StagesÂ¶

Your cat grows through 5 stages based on habit consistency:

Stage

Level Range

Appearance

Requirements

Kitten

1-5

Small, basic design

Starting stage

Young Cat

6-15

Slightly larger, more features

70% success rate for 2 weeks

Adult Cat

16-30

Full-sized, detailed

80% success rate for 1 month

Master Cat

31-50

Majestic appearance

85% success rate for 2 months

Legendary Cat

51+

Unique effects and animations

90% success rate for 3 months

Cat MoodsÂ¶

Your catâ€™s mood reflects your recent performance:

Happy (ğŸ˜Š)

  • 80%+ habits completed this week

  • No skipped days

  • Shows playful animations

Content (ğŸ˜º)

  • 60-79% completion rate

  • Normal behavior

  • Occasional playful moments

Neutral (ğŸ˜)

  • 40-59% completion rate

  • Less animated

  • Waiting for interaction

Sad (ğŸ˜¢)

  • Below 40% completion rate

  • Slower animations

  • Needs encouragement

Sick (ğŸ¤’)

  • Multiple days skipped

  • Minimal movement

  • Requires urgent attention

Interacting with Your CatÂ¶

Build your bond through interactions:

Petting

  • Click and hold on your cat

  • Increases happiness temporarily

  • Unlocks affection animations

Feeding

  • Use treats earned from missions

  • Temporary stat boosts

  • Special food unlocks unique reactions

Playing

  • Mini-games available 3x daily

  • Strengthens your bond

  • Earns bonus coins

Customizing

  • Dress your cat with unlocked accessories

  • Change background environments

  • Apply special effects

Accessories & CustomizationÂ¶

Unlock and equip items:

How to Unlock

  • Complete missions

  • Reach level milestones

  • Purchase with earned coins

  • Seasonal events

  • Achievement rewards

Equipping Items

  1. Click wardrobe icon

  2. Browse available items

  3. Select item to preview

  4. Click â€œEquipâ€ to apply

  5. Save your look

Rewards & ShopÂ¶

Earning CurrencyÂ¶

Coins (Main Currency)

  • Daily habit completion: 5 coins

  • Mission completion: 10-50 coins

  • Streak milestones: 25-100 coins

  • Perfect weeks: 100 coins

Gems (Premium Currency)

  • Level up: 1 gem

  • Special achievements: 5 gems

  • Weekly challenges: 10 gems

  • Monthly rewards: 25 gems

Shop CategoriesÂ¶

Cat Accessories

  • Hats: 50-200 coins

  • Outfits: 100-500 coins

  • Special items: 10-50 gems

Backgrounds

  • Themed environments: 100-300 coins

  • Animated scenes: 20-40 gems

  • Seasonal sets: 500 coins

Power-Ups

  • Streak Freeze: 100 coins (skip 1 day without penalty)

  • XP Boost: 50 coins (2x XP for 24 hours)

  • Mission Refresh: 75 coins (new random missions)

Avatar Customization

  • Profile frames: 25-100 coins

  • Status icons: 50 coins

  • Name colors: 10 gems

Exporting DataÂ¶

Download your data for analysis:

  1. Go to Settings â†’ Data Management

  2. Select â€œExport Dataâ€

  3. Choose format (CSV, JSON, PDF)

  4. Select date range

  5. Click â€œDownloadâ€

Friend SystemÂ¶

Connect with other users:

Adding Friends

  1. Click â€œFriendsâ€ tab

  2. Search by username

  3. Send friend request

  4. Wait for acceptance

Friend Features

  • View their cats

  • Compare statistics

  • Send encouragement

  • Share achievements

  • Team challenges

Privacy SettingsÂ¶

Control your visibility:

  • Public Profile: Anyone can view

  • Friends Only: Limited to connections

  • Private: Hidden from leaderboards

  • Anonymous: Display without username

Mobile ExperienceÂ¶

GrowKitty is fully responsive:

Mobile Features

  • Touch-optimized interface

  • Swipe gestures for navigation

  • Push notifications (with permission)

  • Add to home screen (PWA support)

  • Offline mode for basic tracking

Optimized Actions

  • Quick habit check-off

  • Simplified mission view

  • Easy cat interaction

  • Voice input (optional)

Installation as App

iOS:

  1. Open in Safari

  2. Tap Share button

  3. Select â€œAdd to Home Screenâ€

  4. Confirm installation

Android:

  1. Open in Chrome

  2. Tap menu (â‹®)

  3. Select â€œAdd to Home Screenâ€

  4. Confirm installation

Tips for SuccessÂ¶

Best PracticesÂ¶

Starting Out

  • Begin with 3-5 manageable habits

  • Set realistic goals based on current routine

  • Enable reminders for new habits

  • Review progress daily

Building Momentum

  • Celebrate small wins

  • Focus on consistency over perfection

  • Use streak freezes strategically

  • Adjust habits as needed

Long-term Success

  • Regularly review and update habit list

  • Challenge yourself with new categories

  • Engage with community features

  • Track trends to identify patterns

Common PitfallsÂ¶

Avoid These Mistakes

  • Adding too many habits at once

  • Setting unrealistic expectations

  • Ignoring your catâ€™s feedback

  • Skipping without reason

  • Not celebrating achievements

Recovery Strategies

  • Use a streak freeze if needed

  • Adjust habit difficulty

  • Take a rest day mindfully

  • Re-engage with easier habits

  • Remember progress isnâ€™t linear
